Additional Scope Comments: Staff have been instructed to label any non-record email as "Non-Record." The email records management system will ignore such messages. Staff may retain or delete non-record email at their discretion (and up to the volume limit of their accounts). This GRS will account of all email records using Items 010 and 011.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to NARA when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: NARA adopted the Capstone approach on 23 January 2013 with the transition to Gmail. Application of this GRS will also include any available legacy email migrated from the previous email platform (Groupwise) to the current system.
